text: Cabus is a village and civil parish in Lancashire, England. It lies 12 miles north of Preston, 9 miles south of Lancaster and 16 miles north east of Blackpool. The electoral ward of Cabus, which includes some northern suburbs of Garstang and a rural area around the village, had a population of 1,573 in 2001 and lies in the Wyre district. The population of the ward had fallen to 1,522 at the 2011 Census. ==See also== *Listed buildings in Cabus ==References== ==External links== Category:Villages in Lancashire Category:Geography of the Borough of Wyre Category:Civil parishes in Lancashire
title: Cabus
